group_1.narration: Manaka Kurumi, Manaka Kurumi,@please report to the student council room@as soon as possible.
We repeat, please come up soon.

group_1.textLeft: Why did they ask for you, Manaka?

group_1.textRight: I can't think of any reason they'd want me.

group_1.textLeft: You can skip the formalities for now.@Just go take care of things.

group_1.textRight: Quite right.@Well, I'll get back to you later!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, see you later!

group_1.textRight: Excuse me...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, there you are.

group_1.textRight: It's you!
Uh, what can I do for you?
We're not talking about chocolate anymore, right?

group_1.textLeft: Mm-hmm, but I never told you@what my real intentions were.

group_1.textRight: Your real intentions...?!

group_1.textLeft: In truth, I didn't need a chocolate that@would guarantee a successful confession.

group_1.textRight: What?@What are you saying?

group_1.textLeft: It's just as it sounds.

group_1.textRight: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
[bgEffect:shakeLarge]Whaaaaaa?!
That's horrible!
So you were just messing with us?!
You're a monster straight out of hell!
The youth these days, treating everything like it's a@game! It's downright terrifying, I swear!

group_1.textLeft: Would you please calm down for a second?

group_1.textRight: No, I will not calm down!

group_1.textLeft: I wanted to know what conclusions@you would draw from my order.

group_1.textRight: Can you be more straightforward, please?

group_1.textLeft: You see, my father is hosting an important dinner.
I was looking for a chef to cook for it.
Everyone has been recommending Walnut's to me,
but I needed information that I could trust.
I deliberately posed a difficult question to you@to see what answers I would get.
Would you prepare food that would hog@all of the attention at the event?
Or would you make food that complements it,@and helps draw out the best in people?

group_1.textRight: So what's your verdict?

group_1.textLeft: You passed, of course.
I believe this would be a@good opportunity for Walnut's.
Would you be willing to take on this job?

group_1.textRight: No. I'll talk to my father about it,@but after being pushed around so much...
Personally, I think I'm going to take a break.

group_1.textLeft: Oh? But I gave you chocolate that would@guarantee a successful confession...

group_1.textRight: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?!

group_1.textLeft: Um, are you sure it's alright for us to@take these chocolate rings, too?

group_1.textRight: I made too many.
Plus, you'd never know.@They might come in handy!

group_1.textLeft: I never said it had to be a confession of love, did I?

group_1.textRight: I haven't even been paid,@and yet I feel like I'm being strong-armed...!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800300:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: Um, excuse me...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
You were the director from the interview...

group_1.textRight: Yes, thank you very much for the other day,@Miss Kurumi.
Thanks to you, we got excellent ratings.
It seems that plucky, hard-working kids@really tug at the viewers' heartstrings.

group_1.textLeft: Don't put it like that!

group_1.textRight: My apologies!

group_1.textLeft: So, what's all this about?!

group_1.textRight: I was told by this young lady,
that I would have the opportunity@to interview you again.
And since I happened to receive some chocolate@from her, I thought I ought to follow up with you.

group_1.textLeft: You even set things up with@these people in advance...?!
That's exactly right!

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textCenter: No way... No way...@I didn't think...
I never thought the time would come when@Chef Manaka would be the one preyed upon...

group_1.narration: <And so, the trials of Manaka Kurumi,@the only daughter of Walnut's,@began once more...>
